name: invite_user_to_channel
description: Invite a user to a channel

input_parameters.name: channel_id
input_parameters.description: An array of 1 conversation IDs for the you are inviting users to. Only accepts 1 channel ID presented as an array.

input_parameters.name: usergroup_ids
input_parameters.description: A list of usergroup IDs to add to the conversation.

input_parameters.name: user_ids
input_parameters.description: A list of user IDs to add to the conversation.

output_parameters.name: usergroup_ids
output_parameters.description: A list of usergroup IDs added to the conversation.

output_parameters.name: user_ids
output_parameters.description: A list of user IDs added to the conversation.
